chatbot.evidence: The customer mentioned being forced to chat with a robot when contacting customer care.
chatbot.description: The customer complained about being forced to interact with a chatbot instead of speaking to a human agent.
chatbot.suggestion: Improve the customer care system to provide the option for customers to speak with a human agent instead of being forced to use the chatbot.

complaint.description: The customer is complaining about unauthorised subscriptions on their number that are deducting airtime.
complaint.suggestion: Investigate and resolve the issue of unauthorised subscriptions to prevent further deductions and provide a refund for the deducted airtime.

meta.review_content:
This company is a scam. Every now and then there are subscriptions on my number that are taking my airtime but I never subscribed to anything.
When you call their customer care, they force you to only end up at the prompted messages or chat with their robot. 

This is NOT ON
